Question: When **** was twenty, Tom Lefroy, a nephew of neighbours, visited Steventon from December 1795 to January 1796.
Hints: This person began work on a second novel, First Impressions, in 1796.
Of her brothers, this person felt closest to Henry, who became a banker and, after his bank failed, an Anglican clergyman.
Family tree showing this person's siblings and her nephews and nieces.
